## ConsoleComponentSink interface

Definition of sink that will write to `ConsoleComponent`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ConsoleComponentSink 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [logs](./common-structured-log.consolecomponentsink.logs.md) | <code>ConsoleComponentLog[]</code> | Gets current logs |
|  [logsChange](./common-structured-log.consolecomponentsink.logschange.md) | <code>Observable&lt;void&gt;</code> | Occurs when logs change |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [clear()](./common-structured-log.consolecomponentsink.clear.md) | Clears all current logs |
